title: Here's why Kangana Ranaut wanted to slap Sugandha Mishra : Reality TV, News - India Today
text:
Here's why Kangana Ranaut wanted to slap Sugandha Mishra Things recently took an awkward turn on the sets of the show The Voice India Season 2. IANS | Posted by Anvita Singh A + A - Things got awkward between Sugandha Mishra and Kangana Ranaut recently on the sets of the show The Voice India. Picture courtesy: Instagram/kangana_queen; Instagram/sugandhamishra_fc 
Comedienne-actress Sugandha Mishra had an awkward encounter on TV show The Voice India Season 2 when she tried to do National Award-winning actress Kangana Ranaut's mimicry in front of her. 
Kangana along with actor Shahid Kapoor appeared on the show to promote her upcoming film Rangoon. #KanganaRanaut ke saath pehle hi date par Niyam ne maara chauka! #TheVoiceIndiaS2 . Sat-Sun, 9 pm, on &TV. https://t.co/hzY2qfGFoQ 
Singers Salim Merchant and Shaan, who appear as coaches on the show, started to pull Sugandha's leg and asked her to mimic Kangana in front of her. 
To that, Kangana said: "I feel like slapping her." 
A source from the set said: "It was a nail-biting moment after Kangana's shocking statement. It surely was an awkward moment for Sugandha, but she took it in a sporting spirit and continued with the shoot." 
The Voice India Season 2 is aired on &TV. For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
